ttworkbench.play.parameters.ipv6.components.messaging.components.registry

Class MessageRegistry

  • java.lang.Object
    • ttworkbench.play.parameters.ipv6.components.messaging.components.registry.MessageRegistry
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IMessageInformation, IMessageRegistry

    public class MessageRegistry
extends java.lang.Object
implements IMessageRegistry, IMessageInformation
    ErrorKindCounter enables counting of messages that occur. Thereby ErrorKindCounter distinguishes by the ErrorKind. Furthermore registered observers will be informed about counting events.
    Author:
    Johannes Dahlke
